Its a good and really balanced game in terms of scariness. However I did not like how the movement was I couldnt do much I know its based on the mouse too but my keys somehow felt weird. Other than movement the game was an amazing experience.

I've played just about every farming sim on the market, and let me tell you, after you get repeatedly unhooked in front of the killer by a Dwight who doesn't have Borrowed Time and he proceeds to point at and teabag your dead body, no other farming simulator will compare!

Раньше все время умирала, когда вся моя команда старалась победить. Сейчас вот играем и научилась мансить и стала больше сбегать. Очень интересная прокачка персонажей и захватывающая атмосфера. То, что нет голосового чата дает еще большего погружения в игру. В игре красивые скины, которые можно приобрести и переодически выходят новые маньяки и сурвы. Советую!

Trudno o zbalansowanie stron jeżeli Behavior Interactive słucha się tylko killerów i zaczyna pogarszać wszystkie perki survów. Do tego głupie aktualizacje typu głośna muzyka GhostFace przez którą ciężko usłyszeć klapę w końcowym etapie. Dużo denerwujących killerów m.in. Pinhead. Promowanie tęczowych ludków też na minus. Na plus? Eventy z nagrodami i chyba tyle. Horrorem bym tego nie nazwał ale okej, momentami gra jest śmieszna jak dzieci denerwujące się o spamowanie kucania w grze. Moja ocena na ten moment jest negatywna, zmieni się kiedy Behaviour zacznie słuchać się też drugiej strony i przestanie ją osłabiać. Pozdrawiam.

To anyone new AVOID this game. As a day 1 player it was fun till after year 3 then after that it got worse and worse to the point where every survivor perk is useless except for 2 and every killer perk is buffed. Killer mains running the forms to be the most brain dead toxic people in the world. SWF can be toxic but 99% of the toxicity is just baby killers wanting a perfect 4.0 kill rate instead of the current 3.7. DO NOT DOWNLOAD and if old player DO NOT RETURN(put 4k hours on xbox as well)

游戏是好游戏，所谓对新手不友好其实也还行毕竟不是竞技游戏还是比较容易获得快乐，这个游戏技能很多但是对于萌新来讲除了一些常见的技能之外别的印度技能没有必要去记，慢慢玩着就了解了。其次就是作为人类玩家锐评一下这个游戏玩家水平参差不齐过于严重，经常排到瓜皮队友，开局不拆路灯不修机甚至不摸宝，拿着手电在那里当战地记者，可能是别人和屠夫二人转的时候他作为第三者很兴奋很有参与感吧，还有那些逛街的人我搞不懂你是来dbd看风景了么，那影魔把灯关了我寻思你也看不见啥吧。还有红一的人类，500小时甚至1000小时的，还会有好多不会玩游戏的，屠夫打回防或者直接贴脸守的你处理不好没怀表给哥们救死也就算了，有些人就是纯种的屠夫还没走几步就秒救，然后屠夫直接回头针对，所以我现在就带个打击，不是怕守尸的是被队友搞怕了。总而言之就是你这游戏上手之后搞你的只能是人类队友，屠夫其实见得多了他怎么玩都是他的自由，碰见硬守的大不了吐口痰下一把。

Kinda unique in its own way, but you'll need the wiki next to you all the time if u don't want to be lost between different killers all unique. I forgo all that by watching videos when the game launched because the premise was interesting, but with diferent surivors all the same but each one with specific skills you'll need to grind alongside the ones from all the killers from the game, this is not an easy path. Honesty i feel its a fuckfest of builds (which is the worst i feel for the survivors) but each one has personality, usefulness and its kinda straight forward once you know what you are doing. If you are willing to forgo the obtuse of a 4vs1 multiplayer 6 years old game which has been adding content and making changes constantly troughout its history this is the game for you. Also its funny that the ones that are scared the most of this game are the new players or the very tryhard ones, there is no in between so be my guest which one would you fall into...
 
P.D. Something VERY important to note is that this game is like opening voice chat in OG Call of Duty, you'll never know what kind of piece of shit will be at the other side trying to have fun at your expenses, but you can always do the same to them. What i'm saying is that despite not having voice chat this game exudes toxicity, but its so raw, dumb and human in nature that you come back after a while because "it's not THAT bad" (Again, like CoD)

I think the game is mostly hit or miss, it really depends on the people you're playing with to make it a good game. I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just, watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. loaded into the game, picked my character and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. loved it as it was the best time had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
